00034 namespace CALICE {
00035   
00036 template <class T, const char *str, class M = TempModel>
00037 class FastCalib2DProcessor;
00038 
00043 template <class T, const char *str, class M >
00044 class FastCalib2DProcessor : public marlin::Processor {
00045 
00046   public: 
00047     typedef std::map<int,int> parameterMap;
00048 
00049     virtual Processor* newProcessor() {return new FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>();}
00050   
00051     FastCalib2DProcessor(): marlin::Processor(str),
00052     _calibrationChange(this,&FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::calibrationChanged),
00053     _ahcSroModDataChange(this, &FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::ahcSroModDataColChanged),
00054     _ahcSroModDataCol(0)
00055     {
00056        _description = "This processor makes a calibration constant available which is stored module wise";
00057        registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName", "Name of the input collection",
00058                            _inputColName, std::string("CaliceHitsLevel1"));
00059                             
00060        registerProcessorParameter("ParameterCollectionName", "Name of the parameter collection",
00061                            _parameterColName, std::string("CaliceHitsParameter1"));
00062                             
00063        registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", "Name of the output collection",
00064                            _outputColName, std::string("CaliceHitsLevel2"));
00065                            
00066        registerProcessorParameter("CalibrationCollectionTemplate", "Template for the name of the module wise collections with the calibration constants",
00067                            _calColName, std::string("Calibration_"));
00068            
00069        registerProcessorParameter("AHC_SRO_ModData","Name of the conditions collection for the AHC Slow r/o data.",
00070                            _ahcSroModDataColName, std::string(COL_AHC_SRO_MOD));
00071        
00072        IntVec modulesExample;
00073        modulesExample.push_back(0);
00074   
00075        registerOptionalParameter("Module", "Add calibration for module", _modules, modulesExample, modulesExample.size());         
00076        registerProcessorParameter("ZeroSuppression", 
00077                             "apply (1) or ignore (0) calibration induced cut",
00078                             _zeroSuppression,
00079                             1);
00080        _tempModel = new M();
00081        _calibSet = new CalibrationSet<T>(_tempModel);
00082     };
00083     
00084     
00085     virtual ~FastCalib2DProcessor() {
00086       delete _calibSet;
00087       delete _tempModel;
00088     };
00089     
00090     
00091     virtual void init() {
00092       printParameters();
00093       std::stringstream message;
00094       bool error=false;
00095       if (parameterSet("Module")) {
00096         unsigned index = 0 ;
00097         message << "Missing condition data: "; 
00098         while (index < _modules.size() ){
00099 
00100           char _mod[10];
00101           sprintf(_mod,"%.2d",_modules[index++]);       
00102           std::string _module(_mod);
00103           std::string _finalCalColName = _calColName + _module;
00104         
00105           if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener (&_calibrationChange ,_finalCalColName)) {
00106             message << " " << _finalCalColName;
00107             error=true;
00108           } else {
00109 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00110         std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor: register conditions data handler for collection " << _finalCalColName << std::endl; 
00111 #endif        
00112           }
00113         }
00114        if (error) {
00115           message <<  ".";
00116           throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00117         }
00118       }
00119       _overwrite = (_inputColName == _outputColName);
00120       if (_overwrite)
00121         std::cout << "Replacing collection " << _outputColName << std::endl;
00122       else
00123         std::cout << "Appending collection " << _outputColName << std::endl; 
00124     };
00125 
00126 
00127     void calibrationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00128       _calibSet->fill(col);
00129       _calibSet->setTemp(_ahcSroModDataCol);
00130     };
00131 
00132 
00133     void ahcSroModDataColChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00134       _ahcSroModDataCol = col;
00135       _calibSet->setTemp(_ahcSroModDataCol);
00136     };
00137 
00138 
00139     virtual void processEvent(LCEvent *evt) {
00140       try {
00141         lcio::LCCollection* inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00142         lcio::LCCollection* parameterVector = evt->getCollection(_parameterColName);
00143         lcio::LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT);
00144         lcio::LCFlagImpl hitFlag(_outputCol->getFlag());
00145         hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::RCHBIT_TIME);
00146         hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::CHBIT_ID1);
00147         _outputCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00148         parameterMap _parameterMap;
00149         for (int j = 0; j < parameterVector->getNumberOfElements(); j++) {
00150           FastCaliceHit* parameterHit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit*>(parameterVector->getElementAt(j));
00151           _parameterMap[parameterHit->getModuleID()<<16+parameterHit->getCellKey()] = j;
00152         }
00153 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00154         std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent() # of oldhits: " << inVector->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00155 #endif  
00156         for (int i = 0; i < inVector->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00157           FastCaliceHit* oldHit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00158 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00159           std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent() oldHit: " << _inputColName << " ";
00160           oldHit->print(std::cout);
00161 #endif    
00162           T* aCalibration = _calibSet->getCalib(oldHit->getModuleID(), oldHit->getCellKey());
00163           if (aCalibration) {
00164             parameterMap::const_iterator mapIter=_parameterMap.find(oldHit->getModuleID()<<16+oldHit->getCellKey());
00165             FastCaliceHit* aFastCaliceHit;
00166             if ((mapIter!=_parameterMap.end()) && aCalibration->calibrationValid()) {
00167               FastCaliceHit* parameterHit = dynamic_cast<FastCaliceHit*>(parameterVector->getElementAt(mapIter->second));
00168               float _newValue = aCalibration->applyCalibration(oldHit->getEnergyValue(), parameterHit->getEnergyValue());
00169               float _newError = aCalibration->applyCalibrationError(oldHit->getEnergyValue(), oldHit->getEnergyError(), 
00170                                                                     parameterHit->getEnergyValue(), parameterHit->getEnergyError());
00171               if (!_overwrite) { 
00172                 aFastCaliceHit = new FastCaliceHit(oldHit->getModuleID(), oldHit->getChip(), oldHit->getChannel(), 
00173                                            _newValue, _newError, oldHit->getTimeStamp());
00174                 if ((_zeroSuppression!=1) ||
00175                      aCalibration->keepEvent(_newValue, _newError)) { 
00176 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00177                   std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent() newHit:";
00178                   aFastCaliceHit->print(std::cout);
00179 #endif
00180                   if (aFastCaliceHit) _outputCol->addElement(aFastCaliceHit);
00181                 } else
00182                     delete aFastCaliceHit;
00183               } else {
00184                 if ((_zeroSuppression!=1) ||
00185                      aCalibration->keepEvent(_newValue, _newError)) {
00186                   oldHit->setEnergyValue(_newValue);
00187                   oldHit->setEnergyError(_newError);
00188                 } else {
00189                   inVector->removeElementAt(i--);
00190                   delete oldHit;
00191                   }
00192                 }
00193             } else {
00194                 if (_overwrite) { inVector->removeElementAt(i--); delete oldHit; }
00195 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00196                 std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent(): calibration not valid" << std::endl;;
00197 #endif                       
00198               }
00199           } else {
00200               if (_overwrite) { inVector->removeElementAt(i--); delete oldHit; }
00201 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00202               std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent(): no calibration" << std::endl;
00203 #endif                       
00204             } 
00205         }
00206         if (!_overwrite) evt->addCollection(_outputCol, _outputColName);
00207       }
00208       catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) {
00209 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00210       std::cout << "FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M>::processEvent(): data not available exception" << std::endl;
00211 #endif
00212       };
00213     };
00214 
00215   protected:
00216     std::string _inputColName;
00217     std::string _parameterColName;
00218     std::string _outputColName;
00219     std::string _calColName;
00220     std::string _ahcSroModDataColName;
00221     IntVec _modules;
00222     bool _overwrite;
00223     int _zeroSuppression;
00224     CalibrationSet<T>* _calibSet;
00225     M* _tempModel;
00226  
00227   private:
00228     ConditionsChangeDelegator<FastCalib2DProcessor<T,str,M> > _calibrationChange;
00229     ConditionsChangeDelegator<FastCalib2DProcessor<T, str, M> > _ahcSroModDataChange;
00230     lcio::LCCollection* _ahcSroModDataCol;
00231 
00232 };
00233 
00234 }

00236 #endif
